title: Spa by JW Makes Asia Pacific Debut at 5-Star Hotel in Andheri, Mumbai
text:
SOURCE: JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar July 16, 2015 12:27 ET Spa by JW Makes Asia Pacific Debut at 5-Star Hotel in Andheri, Mumbai 
JW Marriott Hotel Mumbai Sahar Spa Caters to Individuals and Groups With an Array of Treatments and Facilities 
MUMBAI, INDIA--(Marketwired - Jul 16, 2015) - India's Ayurvedic tradition has been around for thousands of years, and its holistic approach to healing is still relevant today. Marrying this ancient practice with modern techniques, products and facilities is JW Marriott Hotel Mumbai Sahar's new Spa by JW. 
Making its debut in Asia Pacific at this Mumbai airport hotel , Spa by JW combines luxurious surroundings with purposeful treatments, focusing on four core benefit states: A calm , tranquil environment sets the stage for soothing, signature treatments including Sleep Deeply and Shirodhara massage Guests can indulge in pampering services including the Ultimate Aromatherapy massage and the Intense Nourishment luxurious body treatment Treatments such as Jet Lag Cure, Abhyangam massage and Energy Boost express massage invigorate the body and mind, replacing everyday stress with new-found energy Amid the chaos of daily life, guests at this Andheri, India spa can renew with treatments including Feel Revived, Intense Muscle Release, Marine Body Wrap and brightening facials 
To ensure guests reap the full benefits of the spa experience, a Spa Lounge was created, offering zones to support the varying needs of each individual. Two express treatment pods, featuring specially designed massage chairs, allow for a quick but effective 12-, 25- or 40-minute dry massage for the back, neck, shoulders and hands. The experience is perfect for busy business travellers or a quick post- or pre-flight treatment. Those who want a solo escape to relax or even work can focus on their needs in a private treatment pod , offering seclusion along with Wi-Fi, a curated music selection and optional foot massage. In addition to these zones and its seven treatments rooms, including one for couples, the spa includes two steam rooms and saunas, separate men's and women's Jacuzzis and a dressing and makeup room. The spa experience at this BOM airport hotel can also be enjoyed long after one's stay thanks to a retail space offering products used in treatments as well as those carefully selected by the therapists. 
About JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar Timeless elegance with a modern twist exudes from every corner of the five-star JW Marriott Hotel Mumbai Sahar. The brand's second Mumbai hotel, less than a kilometer from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport and near popular attractions, is the ideal destination for business or leisure. Crisp, bright accommodations are the most spacious in the area with convenient amenities including 24-hour room service, Wi-Fi, a cozy robe and slippers and 32-inch LCD TV. Restaurants highlight both local and international flavours, including all-day dining at JW Caf√© and home-style Italian fare at Romano's. With more than 15 acres, the hotel offers a resort-like experience with a destination spa, 24-hour fitness centre and an outdoor pool. The Mumbai hotel's 56,000 square feet of event space includes 11 meeting rooms and romantic outdoor wedding venues.
